article.title: General Dynamics Awarded $34 Million for M1A1 Abrams Tank Upgrades
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics Land Systems has received a $34 million delivery order for 30 M1A1 Abrams integrated management (AIM) main battle tanks. The contract includes an option for an additional 30 tanks, bringing the potential award value to $69.5 million.
